entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ef Core 7 RC2 NamingConvention get_EntityTypeAddedConventions method not found #29327
  • How could I set the name of a shadow property for a foreign key? #29322
  • Compiled Models #29320
  • Removal of a new optional navigation entity does not reset foreign key current value #29318
  • FromSqlRaw + OwnedEntity + Where on PK throws #29317
  • TPT query perf regression in EF7 #29315
  • System.Drawing.Common is transitively referenced by Micosoft.Data.SqlClient 5.0.1 meaning that AWS Lambda now fails #29316

Closed

  • Decimal Parameters in query default to Precision=18, Scale=2 #29313
  • Why was my previous bug about windows 11 and ef core toooling not working #29319
  • What is the best way to get the database column name of Entity Property (EF core 7 RC2) #29321
  • Convert.ToDecimal in Projections #29282
  • Add support for validating data and reporting problems during data migrations #29299
  • Add a way to delete seed made with HasData without removing data in the database #29273
  • SQLiteFunction not working #29233
  • dbcontext scaffold introduces InvalidOperationException on Join Entity configuration for many-to-many relationships #29218
  • DbContext Instance gets Disposed. #29197
  • Update SqlClient from 5.0.0 to 5.0.1 #29301
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #29326
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #29325
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #29323
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #29324
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.30.1 to 3.31.0 #29310
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Query: Use type mapping from IDbFunction while translating (#27995) #29216
    Servicing-consider
  • Bump Mono.TextTemplating from 2.2.1 to 2.3.0 #29312
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
